description: this is the identifier for the start of the AERACK01 TCP packet
the length of this packet (not including all bytes up-to and including this number)
the valid time for this packet (usually 1 second behind actual time)
indication of whether the CRIO is successfully synchronised to PTP time in ASCII( 1 = synced, 0 = not-synced )
the internal hardware temperature of the CRIO in integer degrees celcius
indicates the flight number for this packet ( an "XXXX" string here indicates that the CRIO hasn't been assigned a flight number )
indicates whether the FPGA code is running ( a value toggling e.g. 1-0-1-0…etc shows running code, fixed value = non running )
indicates whether the realtime code is running ( a value toggling e.g. 1-0-1-0…etc shows running code, fixed value = non running )
- currently unused but for future use ( a padding byte of 0x20 is used as a placeholder )
this number starts @ zero and increments with each UDP packet - used for verification of packet stream
a byte to represent the percentage of CRIO hard disk currently used (0 to 100)
- Which disk is being used, INT = internal flash : USB = usb flash drive : --- = NODATA!
- currently unused but for future use ( a padding byte of 0x20 is used as a placeholder )
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the filter 1 flow transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the filter 1 pressure transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the filter 2 flow transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the filter 2 pressure transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the psap flow transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the psap linear transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the psap logarithmic transducer
the raw reading (in volts) taken from the psap transmission
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total blue output
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total green output
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total red output
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer backscatter blue output
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total backscatter green output
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total backscatter red output
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer pressure transducer
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer temperature transducer
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer humidity transducer
the instrument reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer status output
the instrument time stamp
the neph mode of operation
raw ppm reading for the buck hygrometer
temperature of sample chamber in degrees celcius
the reading to represent the buck mirror temperature
the reading to represent the buck mirror flag
the reading to represent the buck coldfinger temperature
the reading to represent the buck pressure transducer
the reading to represent the buck balance output
the reading to represent the buck status output
the reading to represent the buck mirror flag
the reading to represent the buck board temperature reading
the voltage (in volts) being input to the buck CR2
